DKeep.logic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • DKeep.logic.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Game - Main Class when the game runs.
    Since:
    2018-03-30
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    André Esteves && Luís Diogo Silva

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        Creates a new Game. Standard new Game, starting Level 1 with regular objects.

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String personality)
        Creates a new Game with a given personality. Types of Personality: - Rookie - Suspicious - Drunken
        Parameters:
        personality - String that refers to the personality of the Guard to Level 1.

    • Method Detail

      • restartGame

        public void restartGame()
        Restarts the Game. Back to the standard Level 1.

      • advanceLevel

        public void advanceLevel()
        Advance level. Current Level is Level 1 and advances to Level 2.

      • advanceLevel

        public void advanceLevel(int numberOgres)
        Advance level. Current Level is level 1 and advances to Level 2 with a given number of Ogres.
        Parameters:
        numberOgres - Number of Ogres to Level 2.

      • advanceLevel

        public void advanceLevel(int numberOgres,
                         char[][] map)
        Advance Level. Current Level is Level 1 and advances to Level 2 with a give number of Ogres and Map.
        Parameters:
        numberOgres - Number of Ogres to Level 2.
        map - Map to be played on Level 2.

      • startLevel1

        private void startLevel1()
        Prepare Objects of level 1. Standard. Sets level integer variable to 1. Sets map char[][] variable to the map of level 1. Sets hero and guard in correct positions.

      • startLevel1

        private void startLevel1(java.lang.String personality)
        Prepare Objects of Level 1. With given Guard personality. Sets level integer variable to 1. Sets map char[][] variable to the map of Level 1. Sets hero in correct position.
        Parameters:
        personality - Type of Guard (Rookie, Suspicious or Drunken)

      • startLevel2

        private void startLevel2()
        Prepare Objects of Level 2. Sets level integer variable to 2. Sets map char[][] variable to the map of Level 2. Sets hero in correct position. Generates a random number of Ogres [1-4] in a random position between some restrictions.

      • startLevel2

        private void startLevel2(int numberOgres)
        Prepare Objects of Level 2. Sets level integer variable to 2. Sets map char[][] variable to the map of Level 2. Sets hero in correct position. Generates numberOgres Ogres in a random position in the current map.
        Parameters:
        numberOgres - Number of Ogres of to have on Level 2.

      • startLevel2

        private void startLevel2(int numberOgres,
                         char[][] map)
        Prepare Objects of Level 2. Sets level integer variable to 2. Sets hero in correct position. Sets map char[][] variable with the given map. Generates numberOgres Ogres in a random position in the current map.
        Parameters:
        numberOgres - Number of Ogres of to have on Level 2.
        map - Map where the game "runs".

      • heroMove

        public void heroMove(char m)
        Moves the Hero in the respective map
        Parameters:
        m - Movement char of the hero. Can be: 'a' - moves left. 'd' - moves right. 'w' - moves up. 's' - moves down.

      • evalStatus

        public int evalStatus()
        Evaluates the game status in the exactly state. Responsible to the movement of Ogre and his Swing on the Level 2.
        Returns:
        Integer: - 0 , no end game reached. Game continues. - 1 , victory condition reached. - 2 , defeat condition reached. - 3 , error reached.

      • setMap

        public void setMap(char[][] map)
        Sets the map char[][] variable with the given map parameter.
        Parameters:
        map - Variable to set the char[][] map of the class.

      • getMap

        public char[][] getMap()
        Gets the current Map.
        Returns:
        char[][] map of current Game.

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Gets the level of the current Game.
        Returns:
        level variable of Game.

      • getGuard

        public Guard getGuard()
        Gets the Guard of current Game.
        Returns:
        Guard g of Game.

      • getHero

        public Hero getHero()
        Gets the Hero of current Game.
        Returns:
        Hero h of Game.

      • getOgre

        public Ogre[] getOgre()
        Gets the Ogres of current Game.
        Returns:
        Ogre[] o of Game.

      • setHero

        public void setHero(int x,
                    int y)
        Sets Hero position and his position on map with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - X position to set Hero xPos.
        y - Y position to set Hero yPos.

      • setHero

        public void setHero(int x,
                    int y,
                    char pos,
                    char sym)
        Sets Hero position with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - X position to set Hero xPos.
        y - Y position to set Hero yPos.
        pos - Character char behind Hero position on current map.
        sym - Symbol of Hero.

      • setGuard

        public void setGuard(Guard g)
        Sets Guard personality and his attributes.
        Parameters:
        g - Guard to set Guard g variable.

      • setOgre

        public void setOgre(int x,
                    int y)
        Sets all Ogres with a given position, x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - X position to set Ogres position.
        y - Y position to set Ogres position.

      • setOgre

        public void setOgre(Ogre[] ogres)
        Sets Ogre[] o variable with a given Ogre[].
        Parameters:
        ogres - Array of Ogre to set Ogre[] o variable.

      • lvl2Check

        void lvl2Check()
        Performs several maintenance for level 2
